# hv_vmx_vcpu_write_shadow_vmcs(_:_:_:)

**Function**

Set the value of a shadow VMCS field of a vCPU.

## Declaration

```swift
func hv_vmx_vcpu_write_shadow_vmcs(_ vcpu: hv_vcpuid_t, _ field: UInt32, _ value: UInt64) -> hv_return_t
```

## Parameters

- **vcpu**: The vCPU ID.
- **field**: The ID of the shadow VMCS field to write.
- **value**: The value of the shadow VMCS field to write.

## Return Value

[doc://com.apple.hypervisor/documentation/Hypervisor/HV_SUCCESS] if the operation was successful, otherwise an error code specified in [doc://com.apple.hypervisor/documentation/Hypervisor/hv_return_t].

## Discussion



## Shadow fields

- **hv_vmx_vcpu_read_shadow_vmcs(_:_:_:)**: Returns the current value of a shadow VMCS field of a vCPU.
- **hv_vmx_vcpu_set_shadow_access(_:_:_:)**: Set the access permissions of a shadow VMCS field of a vCPU.
- **hv_shadow_flags_t**: Shadow VMCS permissions for the set shadow access function.
- **Shadow Permissions**: Permissions that define access to the shadow VMCS fields.
